class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult
class.brief_description: Multiplies a [Transform] and a [Vector3] within the visual shader graph.
class.description: A multiplication operation on a transform (4x4 matrix) and a vector, with support for different multiplication operators.

members.member: The multiplication type to be performed. See [enum Operator] for options.

constants.constant: Multiplies transform [code]a[/code] by the vector [code]b[/code], skipping the last row and column of the transform.
Multiplies vector [code]b[/code] by the transform [code]a[/code], skipping the last row and column of the transform.
